name: XOMBEE MPFPS
description:
XOMBEE MPFPS is a Solo Project made using Unreal Engine 4.26
A FPS played Solo or Online Multiplayer with 3rd Person view added in
The Game is Mutant vs Humans with some Maps also containing XOMBEE's to fight as well . 7 Unique Levels to play
Maps included are : Conquest , Rush , Vehicle , Team Death Match , Death Match , Capture the Flag , Kill Confirmed
4 Character Classes - Assault , Medic , Support , Scout
Some of Weapons included are : Shotgun , Assault Rifle , Sniper Rifle , LMG , 9 mm , Grenades and more ...
Some of the Perks included are - Jet Pack , Med Bot , Speed Boost , Mine and more .....
Up to 32 Players and/or Ai Bots
8 Different Soldiers on 2 Teams
Alpha Team includes 1-Robot Girl and 3-Male Tech Soldiers
Beta Team includes 4 - Mutants
With Regular Updates Planned Bi-Weekly .......................... Thanks for Playing !!!
